#summary hseparator widget reference

= hseparator widget =
A [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkHSeparator.html GtkHSeparator]
----

== Definition ==
{{{
<hseparator tag_attr="value"...>
</hseparator>
}}}
"..." denotes acceptance of multiples of the same thing.

== Tag Attributes ==
See the [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkHSeparator.html#GtkHSeparator.object-hierarchy GtkHSeparator] widget and ancestor class properties.

The following custom tag attributes are available:
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Value* || *Since* ||
|| space-expand || Pack widget expanding into space || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || ||
|| space-fill || Pack widget filling space || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || ||

== Directives ==
None.

== Signals ==
None.

== Functions ==
None.

== Notes ==
This widget was introduced in version 0.7.21.
----
